author: Andrew Ang J:
casename: Sie Choon Poh (trading as Image Galaxy) v Amara Hotel Properties Pte Ltd
counsel: Navinder Singh (Navin & Co LLP) for the plaintiff/appellant; Adeline Chong (Rajah & Tann LLP) for the defendant/respondent
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Costs/Whether offer to settle can be taken into account even though not in prescribed form
Damages/Assessment/Appeal against assessment of damages by assistant registrar/Whether assessment should be altered in light of inadequate evidence of loss
